short_summary: IMTD requires additional resources to assist with the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects leveraging various technologies.
description: IMTD requires additional resources to assist with the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects leveraging various technologies. These resources will supplement existing staff to ensure that new and existing IM/IT projects adhere to the established project management and delivery processes that have been developed to provide for the efficient andeffective management and delivery of IM/IT products or services to TBS clients.

SPICT - Architecte d'applications et de logiciels (.NET)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Proposal - Software Architect (.NET) Services

**Reference Number:** #CB-813-74757977

**Publication Date:** November 22, 2023

**To be Closed:** December 13, 2023, 2:00 p.m.

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat invites interested contractors to submit a proposal for software architect services to support the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects leveraging various (.NET) technologies.

**Objective**
The primary objective of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to secure the services of a software architect who will supplement the existing team to ensure the efficient and effective management and delivery of Information Management/Information Technology (IM/IT) projects to Treasury Board of Canada (TBS) clients.

**Scope of Work**
The selected contractor will be responsible for:

* Supplementing the existing staff to ensure adherence to the established project management and delivery processes
* Leveraging various IT technologies to deliver new and existing IM/IT projects
* Providing technical expertise to support the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects

**Evaluation Criteria**
The Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical Merit: The ability to meet the requirements of the project
* Price: The total price for the services offered

**Trade Agreements**
This request is open to contractors who are·

* Participating in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Participating in the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Participating in the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Participating in the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Participating in the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Participating in the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Participating in the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Participating in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Participating in the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Participating in the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Participating in the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Participating in the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**
For further information or to obtain the tender packages, please contact:

* Richard Boyling, Contracting Officer
* Email: [richard.boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:richard.boyling@t
